verbs.description: President Trump ’s rhetorical attacks against James Comey , [ARG1: the man] [ARG0: he] [V: fired] [ARGM-PRD: as FBI director] , have escalated in both frequency and viciousness .
President Trump ’s rhetorical attacks against James Comey , the man he fired as FBI director , [V: have] escalated in both frequency and viciousness .
[ARG1: President Trump ’s rhetorical attacks against James Comey , the man he fired as FBI director ,] have [V: escalated] [ARGM-MNR: in both frequency and viciousness] .
